description:
There are currently thousands of peer reviewed, independently conducted studies linking electromagnetic frequencies to a wide variety of health effects to both humans and the environment. Thousands of doctors, scientists, and specialists have been demanding a halt to the rollout of 5G due to the major risk of health effects based on prior research conducted from scientists all over the world. These scientists of course would never be allowed to speak on a platform such as CNN, BBC, etc because the Telecom companies and mainstream media companies all tie to the same people. There have also been numerous weapons experts, physicists, and former military members warning of the capabilities of 5G technology to be used as a crowd control weapon, and as a massive surveillance tool. 5G is much deeper than just faster internet speed folks. Wake Up.
Share this information.
